name: Cash Book
query:
select * from ((select 
  'Opening' as `Date:Date:200`,
  null as `Debit:Float:200`,
  null as `Credit:Float:200`,
  sum(debit-credit) as `Balance:Float:300`
from 
  `tabGL Entry` 
where
  account like 'Cash%%'
  and posting_date < %(from_date)s)
union all
(select 
  posting_date as `Date:Date:200`,
  sum(debit) as `Debit:Float:200`,
  sum(credit) as `Credit:Float:200`,
  sum(debit-credit) as `Balance:Float:300`
from 
(select 
  derived.*,
  if (against like 'EMP%%', 
      (select employee_name from `tabEmployee Loan` where employee=derived.against limit 1),
        if (against like 'CUST%%', 
          (select customer_name from `tabCustomer` where name=against),
            null)) as `EMPNAME`        
from 
    ((select 
      pay_entry.letter_head,
      gl_entry.voucher_no,
      gl_entry.voucher_type,
      gl_entry.posting_date,
      gl_entry.debit,
      gl_entry.credit,
      gl_entry.against,
      gl_entry.against_voucher_type,
      gl_entry.remarks
    from 
      `tabGL Entry` gl_entry,
      `tabPayment Entry` pay_entry
    where 
      gl_entry.account like 'Cash%%' 
      and gl_entry.voucher_type like 'Paym%%'
      and pay_entry.docstatus = 1
      and pay_entry.name=gl_entry.voucher_no)
  union all
    (select 
      journal_entry.letter_head,      
      gl_entry.voucher_no,
      gl_entry.voucher_type,  
      gl_entry.posting_date,
      gl_entry.debit,
      gl_entry.credit,
      gl_entry.against,
      gl_entry.against_voucher_type,
      gl_entry.remarks      
    from
      `tabGL Entry` gl_entry,
      `tabJournal Entry` journal_entry
    where 
      gl_entry.account like 'Cash%%' 
      and gl_entry.voucher_type like 'Journ%%'
      and journal_entry.docstatus = 1
      and journal_entry.name=gl_entry.voucher_no)
    ) as derived
where posting_date>=%(from_date)s and posting_date<=%(to_date)s
order by posting_date, voucher_type, voucher_no) as net_derived
group by posting_date)) as a
